title: [Admission] So we've just gotten an update..
content:
The pesu kcet counselling is infact not being held on 20th July..Instead the pesu jee 2nd round counselling will be held on that date.

So my question is, anyone here who has NOT appeared for the 1st round of pesu jee counselling , but wants to attend its 2nd round? 

Im one of those people, and i have not uploacded my jee marksheet yet , because the window was closed.

have all of you gotten your pesu jee rank for the 2nd round??

comments.body: Brother it doesn't work tht way they will not give u another rank or smtg once a rank is given it's over !! And they will not open the portal now again to upload
What about people who registered after round 1
What about students who registered after round 1
No students were allowed to do so bro !!
And just think once practically how will they allow new ppl to just come in middle when there are alderdy ppl like 5000+ rank from first round right? Wht abt them
I think they will allow new entries and release a new rank list
I hv alderdy got it confirmed!! And they said no new list whts there thts it
And they said Me there are no new entries or anything bcz once a rank list is released new one will not come
